review: This was my second time at her clinic. I like her knowledge and professionalism, she always explains regarding all the medicines *** ***** ********** ********* ************ As well her availability for follow up through WhatsApp is top-notch and I've actually already recommended her to a friend of mine.
I have been visiting doctor for the last three years now. Always had a good experience, diagnosis and the way doctor deals with patients is superb
Very professional and empathetic doctor. She attended very calmly and explained the issue in detail.

Dr. Mahajan is very ************** empathetic towards the patient and connects you with high class specialist doctors when further investigation is required. 

I would strongly recommend her for anyone in need of good medical advice.
She is good.Gave the right treatment .The medicines given were mild and she promptly answered my messages

Right side of my face from head to neck had suddenly some pain and swelling. I struggled first 3 days as doctors couldn’t diagnose the problem until I met Dr Vaijayanti Mahajan who examined me thorough and at the first instance diagnosed it to be Herpeas Zoster and gave me anti viral medication for 5 days. And along with medicine she gave me lot of comfort with whole lot of conviction that it will get healed in next few days. Her smiling face, her compassion and her ability to make the patient feel comfortable and at home is commendable. I did recover in 5 days as diagnosis was absolutely right! Thank you Dr Vaijayanti for such amazing care and cure! More power to you
I had an excellent experience, smooth all along. Doctor was on time,friendly, prescription was very efficient etc

Dr. Mahajan is clear, concise and extremely prompt. She was kind enough to follow up even after the follow up window had closed because I was traveling and couldn’t get the tests done on time. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience. Highly recommend.

Highly recommend Dr.Mahajan. She was able to diagnose me correctly with Chicken pox simply by going through some pictures and asking a couple of questions. 
She was highly professional and was also kept assuring me that there is nothing to worry about which was very comforting. 
A big thank you to Dr.Mahajan!!!

I visited Dr. Mahajan for what I got to know later was a severe viral infection. She was very calming and pleasant and immediately put me at ease. She also took time to explain the prescription metaculously, which I don’t find a lot of doctors doing. 

I’m sure I will feel better in no time. 

Thank you Dr. Mahajan.

I’m sure I will feel better in no time. 

Thank you Dr. Mahajan.

*** ** ******* ** * **** **** *** ********* ******* She is kind and gentle,  gives good amount of time to each patient. She addresses all our concerns. The best part is that either she or someone from her clinic make a follow-up call about our welfare after starting the treatment. Her treatment has always worked for me and my family.

Doctor listened to my queries patiently and replied with a whiff of humor and put me at ease. However, when you go to a new doctor who is not aware of your frequency of visits to your family doctor for such ailments then tendency of over medication will be an issue.

The Doctor didn’t care to respond after initial Hello from her side.  I have tried several times to contact her but even after reading my appeals she did not care to respond even.  I will most certainly not recommend anyone to take any sort of service from this Doctor.

Her diagnosis method is very good and the best thing is the explanation she provides for the treatment. she also provides great home remedy tips in the prescription which is very informative and valuable

Dr. Vaijayanti  was extremely helpful and just one dose of her medication that she recommended did wonders for me.

Highly highly recommended to everyone!
Doctor was very sweet and her medicines helped me within 24 hours. She was also very responsive on whatsapp and gave me helpful suggestions throughout to take care of my help. Thank you doctor!
Super prompt with the appointment and asked all the relevant questions needed to make an accurate diagnosis. The doctor was super patient and didn’t try to rush me when I expressed all my concerns.
Patient hearing. Effective diagnosis. Detailed prescription given by the doctor which was simple and easy to understand.
Approach to listen patient's problem with patience, examination process as well as explanation of disease is phenomenal....Highly recommended.
Consulted for my friend's migraine problem and the experience with Doctor Mahajan was excellent, she is very friendly and qualified doctor.
reply_text: Hope your friend is doing well. Follow up if needed. Thanks for giving your valuable feedback.

review: She is very friendly and affable. Truly satisfied after consulting with her. Diagnosed the problem precisely.
She is very kind and has a lot of clarity. She doesn’t prescribe medicines unless absolutely necessary

From the many consultations we had so far, Dr.Vyjayanti has been absolutely brilliant. She is incredibly thorough, patient, reassuring and her prescription has helped my dad well during his covid. Thanks so much doctor!
Thank you so much for timely and valuable advice. Dr. Mahajan is very ************* *** prompt. I recovered from my illness well in time due to her timely diagnosis and consulatation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Made the correct diagnosis after listening to my health issue over call. Prescribed medicines gave immediate relief. Responded immediately and helped with queries. Very polite and friendly and patiently discussed and helped me.
Discussed in detail and offered immediate relief . Professional in approach and good hygiene maintained at the clinic.
Will certainly recommend. She took time to read the health reports and explain all parameters. Also explained what can be cured by diet and what needs medication. Listens and clarifies all doubts. 👍
Very friendly and gave proper time to the patient. Great Probing skills also, gave minimum Medicine (no antibiotics)

Had a great experience under Dr.Mahajan's care. Not only has she taken great care of my health by checking up on me daily, but also she is lovely to speak with and very approachable. Would highly recommend Dr. Mahajan to anyone.

Dr. Mahajan is very friendly and best person to consult with. She helped  to get rid of my chest infection completely and with the medicines she suggested had an immediate impact on my health. 
On my second visit when my health got deteriorated because of Viral again I went to see her ..all I had to do was take few extra medicines and I was feeling much better  the next day. 

I would like to highly recommend Dr. Mahajan as a physician. She will ensure that you are healthy asap.
Cheer!!!!

Given that I'm new to the city it was difficult taking telephonic treatments and I really wanted to find a doctor who's presence feels calming. Then I found Dr Vaijayanti through practo. Her calm and charming self, the positivity, the patience with which she hears you out and the diagnosis all top notch! I loved the way she explains things beyond prescribing medicine, like diet, excercise and some interesting medical info!

Dr patiently checked with me on all my symptoms, to provide medication.  The seamless conversation on call without having to wait in the clinic was extremely effective.  Should consider using Video call instead of just audio, so that there is more trust that is developed with patient.  But no complaints about the audio call.

*** ** *** ****** ******* **** **** **** ******* i was suffering from a viral infection ( HZ) and the gynac and dermatologist could not detect it. but here i found Dr Vijayanti and in no time I was healed within a week as per the antivirals prescribed by her. Thank you doctor.

I went to the Dr Vaijayanti with a trivial complaint and got diagnosed accurately. 
Dr Vaijayanti patiently listened to my symptoms , examined and suggested a scan which led to a proper diagnosis.  
She later followed up and assisted me for further treatment.  Was very happy with her and definitely would recommend her.

This was my second experience with Dr. Mahajan. She is very polite and gentle to talk to. The reason I prefer her is because She prescribes only what's needed and let your body adapt to the situation. Gives you attention whenever you need and provides guidance accordingly. Very professional.
** ******* ** * **** ************* ******* She communicates very clearly and is extremely helpful, also in helping out to make follow-up appointments at other medical centres.
Amazing diagnosis, extremely patient and will listen to everything you are having trouble with. Will educate you about your condition and list out a detailed plan for recovery.
The Doctor was patient and took the time to understand the case and thorough with the checks. I would recommend the doctor to anyone looking for advice from a GP
Dr Mahajan listens and understands patience problem. Provides explanation about the issue and gives proper advise. I highly recommend Dr Vaijayanti Mahajan.
Wonderful experience with doctor, She is very understanding and gives proper information about the particular cause.
Most preferred . Doctor takes time to understand the problem and explains everything in detail and how we can tackle the same
Patient and helpful.. Thorough professional.. Went through multiple past prescriptions and gave the right advice
she listen to all my symptoms and problems patiently and advised according to the disease.she also suggested tips that helped a lot.

Thank you Dr for being very patient.Thank you for solving has all the queries. Even after consultation she has helped with minor doubts on whatsapp. 

As mentioned recovered in 5 days.

Dr is very experienced and given the exact medication.
A wonderful warm doctor. Explained everything medically. completely healed after treatment. She regularly does follow-up to check if patient is recovering. very helpful
She took the time to understand the problem and its history. Very kind and attentive doctor. Great consultation experience.
She talks very politely and clears each doubt....much relieved after talking to doctor thank you so much mam🙂
Very approachable, a doctor who is open to every query and patiently explains without getting flustered (to me this is a key quality requirement and is missing in many healthcare professionals )

doctor is very supportive nd encouraging. she replied to my every query patiently. doctor listened to my problems very patiently nd gave the treatment according to that. she was very polite while handling the case.

Smooth consultation procedure.
Exact diagnosis. 
Maximum benefits with minimum medicines prescribed 
Very much satisfied
